pages.text: The problem with hoppers is that they are not only slow, but also poorly suited for larger farms due to their non-existent range.$(br2)With a bit of application of blue pigment, all items in a large radius around the crate can easily be brought to safety.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Radius of 12 blocks. You can disable it by placing a block on top. Offers filters to specify which items it should accept.

pages.title: XP Orb Absorption
pages.text: Putting a $(l:magical_items/knowledge_gem)Knowledge Gem$() into a Black Hole Chest allows it to absorb XP orbs, putting the experience into the gem.
